title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in different formats in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
EB: Both the dynamic text item and data/text item should display the datetime values in the same format.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.
2. Display the values in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
3. Compare the format of the datetime values displayed in both items.
